mapper.insert: insert into customer2(c_idx, nickname, id, pw, name, phone, birth, quiz, quiz_a) values(customer2_seq.nextval, #{nickname}, #{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{phone},#{birth},#{quiz}, #{quiz_a})
mapper.update: update customer2 set nickname=#{nickname}, phone = #{phone},quiz_a = #{quiz_a} where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.select: select * from customer2 where id = #{id} and pw=#{pw}
